name: Edith
description:
The project was part the “Making Games” course at ITU in the autumn of 2019. This course is included in master programme: Games, and all members of the development team were students at the time.

Development Team

Nikolaj Schlüter Nielsen - Programmer.

Sune Øllgaard Klem- Programmer.

Anton Sandberg- Programmer.

Aske Zidore - Level Designer, Audio Designer.

Marcel Barboza - Designer.

Nadia P. Larsen - Designer.
